=How can I control motors while reading sensor inputs?=
Using a version newer than 2.0.x or the latest SVN, have your script set the `threadsafe` attribute of the connected brick object to `True`. Then, use the thread module to run multiple threads, one for each thing which you want to do simultaneously (instructions on precisely how to do this are beyond the scope of this document but can be found on the web).
